plot outline: After the accidental passing of her mother, Ragini, Arunima lives a wealthy lifestyle with her builder father Devinder Dua. Both are very close, and after she befriends Manu, is gives his approval. Things change between them she sees him assault a male at a wedding. At a chance meeting with a noble-man, Digvijay Singh, she finds out that her mother was musically-inclined - a fact that was never discussed nor disclosed by her father. When questioned, she finds her father very evasive on any topic involving her mother and her hobbies. Then she finds out that her father has an alias of 'Shyam Prakash', and has been remitting Rs.20,000/- every month to a male named Shibu Narayan. She decides to investigate further and discovers to her horror that her mother was not only abused physically but may also have been killed by him. Watch their relationship deteriorate even more after he gets arrested and charged with killing Ragini.
title: Yeh Faasley
plot: A daughter uncovers a dark secret from her wealthy father's past.

After the accidental passing of her mother, Ragini, Arunima lives a wealthy lifestyle with her builder father Devinder Dua. Both are very close, and after she befriends Manu, is gives his approval. Things change between them she sees him assault a male at a wedding. At a chance meeting with a noble-man, Digvijay Singh, she finds out that her mother was musically-inclined - a fact that was never discussed nor disclosed by her father. When questioned, she finds her father very evasive on any topic involving her mother and her hobbies. Then she finds out that her father has an alias of 'Shyam Prakash', and has been remitting Rs.20,000/- every month to a male named Shibu Narayan. She decides to investigate further and discovers to her horror that her mother was not only abused physically but may also have been killed by him. Watch their relationship deteriorate even more after he gets arrested and charged with killing Ragini.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
